i wish i wish i wish i didnt have to write to this recite to this blow a square flight to this but screw you missed all i can do is sit back and reminisce it was all good times at the crib spitting rhymes put it on our mind that we were destined to shine from scratching on turn tables to running a record label mixing 2pac and biggie with some kane & abel we formed a click that couldnt be fucked with you ran the hardest pit with the dead end click it was e.s.g. lil keke big pokey g-r-a-c-e your boy al-d p-a-t c-note and willean and them boys from botany you brought in big moe my nigga z-ro mike d and clay-do lil flip and lil o them boys from the fo them boys from the tre and last but not least there was h-a-w-k i having nothing else to say but you were so real and thats the way you make me feel
